page.title: 05SAINT JOHN'S PARISH CHURCH
page.content: { SAINT JOHN'S PARISH CHURCH. { HISTORY OF THE CHURCH. The church was built in{1827}using granite stone and the"Later English" style.It was built in the grounds of the old church. { THE GRAVEYARD. It was proposed that the graveyard should be extended by clearing the neighbouring field and draining it. Both parishoners and presbyterians are buried there used to be no graveyard for presbyterians. { CONGREGATION. There are 93 families scattered within the Parish boundary.These families are well established in the area. { INTERIOR. Capable of holding 110 people,but about 90 usually attend.The church is always open and is in good condition.
